document_data.name: Merlin Fastfoot
document_data.mainbody: rlin had sandy blond hair and green eyes.
document_data.Description: Merlin had sandy blond hair and green eyes.
document_data.History: Merlin was encamped at the ruins of [[Beckside Castle]] on the [[High Road (Cormyr)|High Road]] around the time of the [[Sschindylryn invasion of Eveningstar]] and [[Shadovar invasion of Wheloon]]. He passed the time with the [[bard]] [[Lunasa Eveningwood]], singing songs together including ''[[The Mermaid]]'', ''[[The Crafty Maid's Policy]]'', and ''[[Here's a Health to the Company]]''.
